name: elasticsearch
label: ElasticSearch
description: ElasticSearch is a distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine capable of solving a number of use cases. This connector facilitates automated operations to execute lucene query, get mapping and cluster details.

name: mitre-attack
label: MITRE ATT&CK
description: The MITRE ATT&CK knowledge base is used as a foundation for the development of specific threat models and methodologies. Connector helps to replicate knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques based on real-world observations
